name: jitera-e2e
description: Jitera e2e automation testing with cucumber framework

scripts.test:localci:debug:citrue: export CI=true && export E2E_LOCAL_CI=true && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:localci:debug: export CI=false && export E2E_LOCAL_CI=true && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:headless:local: export E2E_WORKERS=8 && export CI=true && export LOCAL=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:headless:local:pr: export FE_ENV_E2E=pr && export PR_FE_DOMAIN_E2E=pr-2018.d3fdrkv5039srx.amplifyapp.com && yarn run test:headless:local
scripts.test:headless:local:preprod: export FE_ENV_E2E=preprod && export BE_ENV_E2E=preprod && yarn run test:headless:local
scripts.test:headless:local:tag: export CI=true && export LOCAL=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts  --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test:headless: export E2E_WORKERS=8 && export CI=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:headless:exporting: export EXPORT_E2E=true && export CI=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite staging_exporting --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test:headless:api: export E2E_WORKERS=4 && export CI=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsresultjs && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite staging_api
scripts.test:headless:tag: export CI=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite staging --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test: export E2E_WORKERS=8 && export CI=false && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:exporting: export EXPORT_E2E=true && export CI=false && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:tag:all: export CI=false && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite staging --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test:tag: export CI=false && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test:debug: export CI=false && export DEBUG=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:staging: export E2E_WORKERS=8 && export CI=true && export ACC_JITERA_E2E=staging && yarn clsrp && wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite staging
scripts.test:pr: export FE_ENV_E2E=pr && export PR_FE_DOMAIN_E2E=pr-2018.d3fdrkv5039srx.amplifyapp.com && yarn run test
scripts.test:preprod: export FE_ENV_E2E=preprod && export BE_ENV_E2E=preprod && yarn run test

author: harryle
